name: Archetype - Fantasy Miniseries - Curses
additionalNotes: Archetype Fantasy Miniseries consist of three robustos, all measuring 5 inches by 50 ring gauge. Each new robusto was rolled with a different blend at Oliva Cigars S.A. in Estelí, Nicaragua. Crystals, which sports a closed foot and pigtail cap, is covered in an undisclosed wrapper, with filler and binder grown in Nicaragua. Curses is also rolled with a closed foot and a pigtail cap and consists of Nicaraguan binder and filler, with a Connecticut broadleaf wrapper. Cloaks is box-pressed with a broadleaf wrapper that enrobes Nicaraguan binder and filler tobacco.
